net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.oom.signature

Class OperationSigMask

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.oom.signature.SigMask<OperationSignature>
      • net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.oom.signature.OperationSigMask

  • public final class OperationSigMask
extends SigMask<OperationSignature>
    Signature mask for an operation. Newly created masks cover any operation that is not abstract.
    Author:
